fields.name: textField
fields.label: Replace This
fields.description: Allows a section of a template to be replaced directly with text entered by the user.  Use with caution, as there is currently no error checking to prevent them from entering invalid values.

fields.name: toggleSection
fields.label: Show the section
fields.description: Using a boolean value may be useful for instances where you want to conditionally toggle between two options.  It will show up as a checkbox for the user, and true/false in the template.

fields.name: selectField
fields.label: Pick one
fields.description: Replaces a piece of the template in the same way as the text field option, but limits the input to values in the select
